responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'userid' field (User identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please provide a valid user ID in the correct format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'username' field (User's display name) must be between 3 and 23 characters long, must contain at least one letter and can contain numbers, and underscores
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Username must be 3-23 characters with at least one letter. Numbers and underscores are allowed.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'offset' field (Pagination offset for retrieved data) must be an integer between 0 and 200
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Page offset must be a number between 0 and 200.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'limit' field (Number of data objects to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Number of items to display must be between 1 and 20.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'postLimit' field (Number of posts to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Number of posts to display must be between 1 and 20.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'filterBy' field (Post filter criteria) must be an array containing only valid ENUM options: IMAGE, AUDIO, TEXT, VIDEO, FOLLOWED, FOLLOWER
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please select valid filter options from the available choices.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'IgnoreList' field (Whether to apply the block list) must be either 'YES' or 'NO' (ENUM options)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please specify either YES or NO for the block list option.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'sortBy' field (Sorting order for posts) must be one of the following ENUM options: NEWEST, TRENDING, LIKES, DISLIKES, VIEWS, COMMENTS
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please choose a valid sorting option from the available choices.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'postid' field (Post identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please provide a valid post ID in the correct format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'title' field (Title of the post to search for) must be between 2 and 63 characters long and can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, dashes (-), and underscores (_)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Post title must be 2-63 characters using letters, numbers, spaces, dashes or underscores.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'tag' field (Tags to search for in posts) must be an array of up to five tags, each between 2 and 53 characters long
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: You can search with up to 5 tags, each 2-53 characters long.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'from' field (Starting date for data retrieval) must be a valid date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter the start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'to' field (End date for data retrieval) must be a valid date in the format YYYY-MM-DD
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter the end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'postOffset' field (Pagination offset for posts) must be an integer
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Post offset must be a whole number.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'commentOffset' field (Pagination offset for comments) must be an integer
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Comment offset must be a whole number.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'commentLimit' field (Number of comments to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Number of comments to display must be between 1 and 20.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'commentid' field (Comment identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please provide a valid comment ID in the correct format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'chatid' field (Chat identifier) must be a valid UUID (format: XXXXXXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXXXXXXXXXX)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please provide a valid chat ID in the correct format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'messageOffset' field (Pagination offset for chat messages) must be an integer
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Message offset must be a whole number.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'messageLimit' field (Number of chat messages to retrieve) must be an integer between 1 and 20
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Number of messages to display must be between 1 and 20.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'searchChatByName' field (Search for chats by name) must be a valid string
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter a valid chat name to search.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'searchChatByUser' field (Find all chats with a specific friend as a participant) must be a valid string
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter a valid username to search for chats.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'day' field (Timeframe selection for data retrieval) must be one of the following ENUM options: D0, D1, D2, D3, D4, D5, W0, M0, Y0
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please select a valid timeframe option from the available choices.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'email' field (User's email address) must be a valid email format
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter a valid email address.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'password' field (User's current password) is required to update the email
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter your current password to update your email.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'password' field (User's new password) must be between 8 and 128 characters long and contain at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, and one number
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: New password must be 8-128 characters with at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'expassword' field (User's current password) is required to update the password
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter your current password to set a new one.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'biography' field (User's biography)must be between 3 and 5000 characters long
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Bio must be between 3 and 5000 characters.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'img' field (User's profile picture) must be a valid image file (JPG, PNG, or GIF) and less than 5MB in size
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Profile picture must be JPG, PNG or GIF under 5MB.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: You don't have permission to perform this action in this chat.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please fill in all required fields with valid information.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: This comment has already been reported by you.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please select a valid action from the available options.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please specify either YES or NO for the ignore list option.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please specify who you want to perform this action with.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter the amount of tokens you want to process.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please provide the transaction ID to continue.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Minimum transaction amount is 10 tokens.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'value' field must be an integer
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter a whole number.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'value' field must be at least the defined minimum
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Value must be at least the minimum required amount.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'value' field must be at most the defined maximum
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Value cannot exceed the maximum allowed amount.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'value' field must be a valid float
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter a valid decimal number.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'max' option is required for the LessThan validator
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Maximum value limit is required for this field.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'max' field must be in a valid date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter the maximum date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'value' field must be in a valid date format (YYYY-MM-DD)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: The image format is invalid. Please upload a valid image.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'message' field must be between 1 and 500 characters long
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Message must be between 1 and 500 characters.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'phone number' field must be an integer between 9 and 21
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Phone number must be 9-21 digits long.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'Solana Public Key' field must be a String between 43 and 44 (only including Chars and Ints without 0 O I 1)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Please enter a valid Solana public key (43-44 characters, excluding 0, O, I, 1).

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The 'tagName' field (Tag identifier) must be between 2 and 53 characters long, must not contain spaces, and may include letters, numbers, special characters, underscores _, and hyphens - (format: valid-tag_name-123)
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Tag name must be 2-53 characters without spaces. Use letters, numbers, underscores or hyphens.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: Title must be between 2 and 30 characters. Please adjust and try again
responseCodes.userFriendlyResponseComment: Title must be 2-30 characters long. Please shorten or lengthen your title.

responseCodes.actualResponseComment: The date must be in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' (e.g., 2025-04-02)
